General.Name: G Mining Ventures Corp
General.Description: G Mining Ventures Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties. Its flagship project is the Tocantinzinho gold project that includes two mining concessions covering an area of 12,889 hectares, 23 exploration licenses covering an area of 76,116 hectares, and two applications for exploration licenses covering an area of 10,569 hectares located in Pará State, Brazil. The company was formerly known as Kanadario Gold Inc. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Québec, Canada.
General.Address: 7900, West Taschereau Boulevard, Québec, QC, Canada, J4X 1C2
